name: FPS TESTING
description:
this is a little fps training thing i made in unity. when unzipping the folder the program is called Block BeamZ i just asked a friend for a game name and put it in.

[LEFT CLICK - hold] A automatic AR you can spray around

[RIGHT CLICK - single] A pistol this is single fire

both guns are pistol models because I was too lazy

Sensitivity is a little weird to change it just change your mouses dpi

ENJOY!
